TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition
Public NotInheritable Class GacMembershipCondition Implements IMembershipCondition
type GacMembershipCondition = class interface IMembershipCondition interface ISecurityEncodable interface ISecurityPolicyEncodable

summary.span: 通过测试程序集的全局程序集缓存成员资格，确定该程序集是否属于代码组。

span.span: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its global assembly cache membership.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有安装在全局程序集缓存中的程序集都被授予 `FullTrust` 权限集。All assemblies installed in the global assembly cache are granted the `FullTrust` permission set. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果代码已安装在全局程序集缓存中，则代码将满足此成员资格条件。Code satisfies this membership condition if it is installed in the global assembly cache. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. 此示例摘自为 类主题提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class topic. span.span: Uses the specified XML encoding to reconstruct a security object, using the specified policy level context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为解析命名权限集引用提供了策略级别上下文。The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references. 例如，代码组使用策略级别来查找命名的权限集。For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
